derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French picaillon, denoting a Piedmontese copper coin, also used to mean 'cash', from Provençal picaioun, of unknown ultimate origin

encyclopedia.content: 简介 定义 （1）琐事的 没有价值的。 （2）卑鄙的 用法：这个词现在是个形容词，但是以前是名词（参见词源学），它的形容词形式是picayunish.这个形容词现在还在用，但是意思已经变成“无聊的”。这个词的名词形式应该是picayuness 但是picayunity似乎现在更为常用。 推荐用法：这种琐碎的性格可以是慢性养成的。例如 Our manager's picayune neatness keeps the office staff on pins and needles we have to keep the o

means.word_mean: 1. (informal terms) small and of little importance;

sentences.sentence: "our worries are lilliputian compared with those of countries that are at war"
"giving a police officer a free meal may be against the law, but it seems to be a picayune infraction"
